languages.text: Один офицер, презрев приказ, отступает от своего рабочего поста... и падает на пол под грохот выстрела. "Выполнять приказ!" — рев Абеляра Версериана, сенешаля Лорд-капитана, возвращает людей в чувство: вокс-клерики и офицеры склоняются над когитаторами. Когда вскрытые двери с грохотом падают и выжившие ковыляют к выходу, большая часть команды остается на своих постах — навсегда. Последн{mf|им|ей} с мостика, поддерживаем{mf|ый|ая} Абеляром, выходит Лорд-капитан.

traits.locale_text: Один офицер, презрев приказ, отступает от своего рабочего поста... и падает на пол под грохот выстрела. "Выполнять приказ!" — рев Абеляра Версериана, сенешаля Лорд-капитана, возвращает людей в чувство: вокс-клерики и офицеры склоняются над когитаторами. Когда вскрытые двери с грохотом падают и выжившие ковыляют к выходу, большая часть команды остается на своих постах — навсегда. Последн{mf|им|ей} с мостика, поддерживаем{mf|ый|ая} Абеляром, выходит Лорд-капитан.

languages.text: One of the officers, scorning the order, steps away from his station... and drops to the deck as a shot rings out. "You have your orders!" Abelard Werserian, the Lord Captain's Seneschal, roars loud enough for the people to come to their senses — the vox-clerics and officers lean over the cogitators. When the doors are broken open and come crashing down, the survivors hobble toward the exit, but the majority of the crew will never leave their posts again. The last to leave, supported by Abelard, is the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.
languages.original_text: Один офицер, презрев приказ, отступает от своего рабочего поста... и падает на пол под грохот выстрела. "Выполнять приказ!" — рев Абеляра Версериана, сенешаля Лорд-капитана, возвращает людей в чувство: вокс-клерики и офицеры склоняются над когитаторами. Когда вскрытые двери с грохотом падают и выжившие ковыляют к выходу, большая часть команды остается на своих постах — навсегда. Последн{mf|им|ей} с мостика, поддерживаем{mf|ый|ая} Абеляром, выходит Лорд-капитан.

traits.locale_text: One of the officers, scorning the order, steps away from his station... and falls to the floor as a shot rings out. "You have your orders!" Abelard Werserian, the Lord Captain's Seneschal, roars loud enough for the people to come to their senses — the vox-cleriks and officers lean over the cogitators. When the doors are broken open and come crashing down, the survivors hobble toward the exit, but the majority of the crew remains at their posts — forever. The last one to leave, supported by Abelard, is the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.

The last one to leave, supported by Abelard, is the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.

One of the officers, scorning the order, steps away from his station... and drops to the deck as a shot rings out. "You have your orders!" Abelard Werserian, the Lord Captain's Seneschal, roars loud enough for the people to come to their senses — the vox-clerics and officers lean over the cogitators. When the doors are broken open and come crashing down, the survivors hobble toward the exit, but the majority of the crew will never leave their posts again. The last to leave, supported by Abelard, is the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.

languages.text: Uno de los oficiales, ignorando la orden, se aleja de su puesto... y cae a plomo al mismo tiempo que suena un disparo. «¡Tenéis vuestras órdenes!». El rugido de Abelard Werserian, senescal de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, hace que la gente recupere el sentido. Los vococlérigos y oficiales se inclinan sobre los cogitadores. Cuando las puertas se rompen y caen, los supervivientes se tambalean hacia la salida, aunque la mayoría de los tripulantes ya no abandonará nunca su puesto. En último lugar y apoyándose en Abelard, sale {mf|el|la} propi{mf|o|a} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}.
languages.original_text: One of the officers, scorning the order, steps away from his station... and drops to the deck as a shot rings out. "You have your orders!" Abelard Werserian, the Lord Captain's Seneschal, roars loud enough for the people to come to their senses — the vox-clerics and officers lean over the cogitators. When the doors are broken open and come crashing down, the survivors hobble toward the exit, but the majority of the crew will never leave their posts again. The last to leave, supported by Abelard, is the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.

traits.locale_text: Uno de los oficiales, ignorando la orden, se aleja de su puesto... y cae a plomo al mismo tiempo que suena un disparo. «¡Tenéis vuestras órdenes!». El rugido de Abelard Werserian, senescal de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, hace que la gente recupere el sentido. Los vococlérigos y oficiales se inclinan sobre los cogitadores. Cuando las puertas se rompen y caen, los supervivientes se tambalean hacia la salida, aunque la mayoría de los tripulantes ya no abandonará nunca su puesto. En último lugar y apoyándose en Abelard, sale {mf|el|la} propi{mf|o|a} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}.

languages.text: 其中一名军官蔑视领主舰长的命令，擅自离开了岗位……随着一声枪响，他倒在了甲板上。“你们都有命令在身！”舰长的总领阿贝拉德·韦尔森大声咆哮起来。他的声音让所有人都清醒了过来，音阵神甫与军官们修理起了沉思者。当大门终于被破坏，轰然倒下时，幸存者们步履蹒跚地走向出口，但绝大部分船员已经永远无法离开岗位了。最后一位离开的是领主舰长{mf|本人|本人}，被阿贝拉德架着走出了舰桥。
languages.original_text: One of the officers, scorning the order, steps away from his station... and drops to the deck as a shot rings out. "You have your orders!" Abelard Werserian, the Lord Captain's Seneschal, roars loud enough for the people to come to their senses — the vox-clerics and officers lean over the cogitators. When the doors are broken open and come crashing down, the survivors hobble toward the exit, but the majority of the crew will never leave their posts again. The last to leave, supported by Abelard, is the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.

traits.locale_text: 其中一名军官蔑视领主舰长的命令，擅自离开了岗位……随着一声枪响，他倒在了甲板上。“你们都有命令在身！”舰长的总领阿贝拉德·韦尔森大声咆哮起来。他的声音让所有人都清醒了过来，音阵祭司与军官们修理起了思考器。当大门终于被破坏，轰然倒下时，幸存者们步履蹒跚地走向出口，但绝大部分船员已经永远无法离开岗位了。最后一位离开的是领主舰长{mf|本人|本人}，被阿贝拉德架着走出了舰桥。

languages.text: 士官のひとりが命令を無視して持ち場から離れる…デッキに降りると銃声が鳴り響いた。「命令に従え！」ロード・キャプテンの家令長、アベラルド・ウェルザリアンが、そこにいる者が理性を取り戻すほどの大声で怒鳴り、ヴォクス・クレリック達と士官達は考算機に体を預けている。扉がこじ開けられ、大きな音を立てて倒されると、生存者たちはよろよろと出口に向かって進むものの、クルーの大半は持ち場から離れることはなかった。アベラルドに支えれらて、ロード・キャプテンは最後にその場を後にした。
languages.original_text: One of the officers, scorning the order, steps away from his station... and drops to the deck as a shot rings out. "You have your orders!" Abelard Werserian, the Lord Captain's Seneschal, roars loud enough for the people to come to their senses — the vox-clerics and officers lean over the cogitators. When the doors are broken open and come crashing down, the survivors hobble toward the exit, but the majority of the crew will never leave their posts again. The last to leave, supported by Abelard, is the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.

traits.locale_text: 士官のひとりが命令を無視して持ち場から離れる…デッキに降りると銃声が鳴り響いた。「命令に従え！」ロード・キャプテンの家令長、アベラルド・ウェルザリアンが、そこにいる者が理性を取り戻すほどの大声で怒鳴り、ヴォクス・クレリック達と士官達は考算機に体を預けている。扉がこじ開けられ、大きな音を立てて倒されると、生存者たちはよろよろと出口に向かって進むものの、クルーの大半は持ち場から離れることはなかった。アベラルドに支えれらて、ロード・キャプテンは最後にその場を後にした。

languages.text: Einer der Offiziere, der den Befehl missachtet, verlässt seinen Platz ... und stürzt auf das Deck, als ein Schuss fällt. "Ihr habt eure Befehle!" Abelard Werserian, der Seneschall des Lord Captains brüllt so laut, dass die Leute zur Besinnung kommen ... die Vox-Kleriker und Offiziere beugen sich über die Cogitatoren. Als die Türen aufgebrochen werden und einstürzen, humpeln die Überlebenden zum Ausgang, aber die meisten werden ihren Posten nie wieder verlassen. Der letzte, der das Schiff verlässt, ist der Lord Captain selbst, unterstützt von Abelard.
languages.original_text: One of the officers, scorning the order, steps away from his station... and drops to the deck as a shot rings out. "You have your orders!" Abelard Werserian, the Lord Captain's Seneschal, roars loud enough for the people to come to their senses — the vox-clerics and officers lean over the cogitators. When the doors are broken open and come crashing down, the survivors hobble toward the exit, but the majority of the crew will never leave their posts again. The last to leave, supported by Abelard, is the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.

languages.text: L'un des officiers décide de quitter son poste au mépris des ordres... mais il ne fait que quelques pas avant de s'effondrer quand un coup de feu retentit. « Vous avez vos ordres ! » rugit Abélard Werserian, le sénéchal {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, assez fort pour dissuader toute autre tentative d'insubordination. Les clercs-vox et les officiers reprennent leur travail sur les cogitateurs. Lorsque les découpeurs à plasma viennent à bout des portes, les survivants se dirigent vers la sortie en chancelant, mais la plupart des membres de l'équipage seront restés à leur poste jusqu'à la fin. {name}, {mf|soutenu|soutenue} par Abélard, est {mf|le dernier|la dernière} à partir.
languages.original_text: One of the officers, scorning the order, steps away from his station... and drops to the deck as a shot rings out. "You have your orders!" Abelard Werserian, the Lord Captain's Seneschal, roars loud enough for the people to come to their senses — the vox-clerics and officers lean over the cogitators. When the doors are broken open and come crashing down, the survivors hobble toward the exit, but the majority of the crew will never leave their posts again. The last to leave, supported by Abelard, is the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.

traits.locale_text: L'un des officiers décide de quitter son poste au mépris des ordres... mais il ne fait que quelques pas avant de s'effondrer quand un coup de feu retentit. « Vous avez vos ordres ! » rugit Abélard Werserian, le sénéchal {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, assez fort pour dissuader toute autre tentative d'insubordination. Les clercs-vox et les officiers reprennent leur travail sur les cogitateurs. Lorsque les découpeurs à plasma viennent à bout des portes, les survivants se dirigent vers la sortie en chancelant, mais la plupart des membres de l'équipage seront restés à leur poste jusqu'à la fin. {name}, {mf|soutenu|soutenue} par Abélard, est {mf|le dernier|la dernière} à partir.

languages.text: Emre itaatsizlik niyetindeki subaylardan biri istasyonundan uzaklaşıp... Bir silah sesi ile birlikte güverteye yığılıyor. "Emirlerinizi biliyorsunuz!" Lord Kaptan'ın Seneşal'i Abelard Werserian, insanların aklını başına devşirecek kadar yüksek bir sesle kükrüyor. Voks ruhbanları ile subaylar, kavramsayarların üzerine eğiliyor. Kapılar kırılarak açılıp yere devrilince hâlâ hayatta olanlar, çıkışa doğru topallıyor. Mürettebatın çoğuysa bir daha görev yerlerinden ayrılamayacak. Son çıkan, Abelard'ın koluna girdiği Lord Kaptan oluyor.
languages.original_text: One of the officers, scorning the order, steps away from his station... and drops to the deck as a shot rings out. "You have your orders!" Abelard Werserian, the Lord Captain's Seneschal, roars loud enough for the people to come to their senses — the vox-clerics and officers lean over the cogitators. When the doors are broken open and come crashing down, the survivors hobble toward the exit, but the majority of the crew will never leave their posts again. The last to leave, supported by Abelard, is the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.

traits.locale_text: Emre itaatsizlik niyetindeki subaylardan biri istasyonundan uzaklaşıp... Bir silah sesi ile birlikte güverteye yığılıyor. "Emirlerinizi biliyorsunuz!" Lord Kaptan'ın Seneşal'i Abelard Werserian, insanların aklını başına devşirecek kadar yüksek bir sesle kükrüyor. Voks kâtipleri ile subaylar, kavramsayarların üzerine eğiliyor. Kapılar kırılarak açılıp yere devrilince hâlâ hayatta olanlar, çıkışa doğru topallıyor. Mürettebatın çoğuysa bir daha görev yerlerinden ayrılamayacak. Son çıkan, Abelard'ın koluna girdiği Lord Kaptan oluyor.
